verbose_text: In sepsis, the Akt / glycogen synthase kinase-3p (Akt / GSK3p) pathway will be affected or activated, increasing the BAX / Bcl-2 ratio (an apoptosis factor), caspase-3 release, and induction of platelet derived growth factor (PDGF).
evidence: Akt/glycogen synthase kinase-3p (Akt/GSK3p) pathway will be affected or activated, increasing the BAX
